title: Bug 6322 - All types dialog shows obfuscated classes
description: Bug 6322 - All types dialog shows obfuscated classes. JDK 1.4 includes obfuscated classes (e.g., a, a1, b, c, d) and they appear prominently in the dialog.
OB: The obfuscated classes appear prominently in the All types dialog.
EB: The obfuscated classes should be displayed less prominently in the All types dialog.
SR:
To address this issue, there are a couple of options:
a) Sort the lower case class names after the ones that start with a capital letter.
b) Filter out the obfuscated classes completely. I suggest option a) as a solution.
